Name: Ratio of Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION to Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION

Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'
